Name: Waifu School
About the game: A romantic & sexy school visual novel mixed with an addicting match-3 puzzle. 10 cute girls are waiting for you... You are the most popular playboy in highschool, hundred girls are crazy about you... but the story always ends up being the same, you are expelled from the school for convenience reason, and now.. you are moving to a new school in remote location. How will this story ends ?.... Features : ■ UNCENSORED VERSION ■ 100 Achievements ■ 10 Cute girls ■ 30 Addictive Levels ■ Romantic Story Visual Novel ■ Romantic & Relaxing Soundtracks FOLLOW US FOR MORE UPDATES...
